title: Epilepsy: a label for life
brief_description: Epilepsy arouses feelings of prejudice and fear amongst members of the community, mainly based on ignorance. Discussed are the types of epilepsy, and use of drugs in treatment. The film also deals with the social and employment problems encountered by epileptics.
